title: Fix navbar logo image src to point to provided logo filename

requirements.text: Update the selected navbar logo image element (XPath `/html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/nav[1]/div[1]/div[1]/button[1]/img[1]`, implemented in `frontend/src/components/home/HomeNavbar.tsx`) so its `` `src` points to `/assets/generated/Tshabalala-1080-x-1080-px-1-e1745416117212-r66kph3gxuhfsp0hg1525ae50su5inwh0amb0wdpkg.png` (exactly as provided by the user, with no `-1` suffix).

quotes: It's the logo this is its filename  Tshabalala-1080-x-1080-px-1-e1745416117212-r66kph3gxuhfsp0hg1525ae50su5inwh0amb0wdpkg.png

acceptanceCriteria: Only the selected navbar logo `` element is changed (no unrelated images or components are modified).

requirements.text: Ensure the static logo file `Tshabalala-1080-x-1080-px-1-e1745416117212-r66kph3gxuhfsp0hg1525ae50su5inwh0amb0wdpkg.png` exists in the frontend static assets directory at `frontend/public/assets/generated/` so it is served at `/assets/generated/Tshabalala-1080-x-1080-px-1-e1745416117212-r66kph3gxuhfsp0hg1525ae50su5inwh0amb0wdpkg.png`.
acceptanceCriteria: The file `frontend/public/assets/generated/Tshabalala-1080-x-1080-px-1-e1745416117212-r66kph3gxuhfsp0hg1525ae50su5inwh0amb0wdpkg.png` is present in the repo/build output.
Loading the app shows the navbar logo rendered (no broken image icon) and the network request for the image returns HTTP 200.

constraints: Apply changes ONLY to the selected element (XPath `/html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/nav[1]/div[1]/div[1]/button[1]/img[1]`) in `frontend/src/components/home/HomeNavbar.tsx`.
Do not edit any files under `frontend/src/components/ui` or other paths listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Redesigning the navbar layout, typography, colors, or adding new navigation items.
Changing the logo `alt` text or adding new branding assets beyond the provided logo file.
